meta_title: What Is QA? Meaning, Definition, and Maintenance Role
meta_description: Quality Assurance (QA) is a proactive process ensuring industrial standards are met. Understand the QA meaning in maintenance, asset reliability, and ISO 9001.
title: What Is Quality Assurance (QA)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is Quality Assurance (QA)?

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic image of a professional maintenance supervisor and a technician in a modern, clean industrial facility. They are wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and reflective vests. The supervisor is holding a digital tablet, pointing at a complex piece of machinery (a large industrial motor or pump) while discussing a quality checklist. The background shows a well-organized factory floor with bright, natural lighting. No text in the image.
